locutie.beschrijving: Exegesis of Romans 9-11 focusing on the relationship between Israel and the Church, the Holocaust, and the irrevocability of God's election.
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: High. The preacher provides historical context (McLaren, Gushee) and linguistic nuance (Israelites vs. Jews).

illocutie.beschrijving: Primarily asserting historical and theological facts about Paul's grief and God's plan, with a late shift toward promising grace.
voorbeelden: I am speaking the truth in Christ
Paul tries to come to terms with the well established fact
The Jews are the clue on the beach

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: To relieve the hearer of the burden of self-justification and to instill awe at God's faithfulness.
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Implicit. Mentioned in the text of Romans 9:1, but not explicitly invoked as the agent of the sermon's current effect.

voorbeelden: Last summer I read a book
These three chapters have had an interesting history
Paul puts some words in one column
We need to know the Bible
I hope you will not think me overly melodramatic
I myself find it very hard
I will never forget a class
The good news today is that we stand fast... by grace alone
We are held... by God’s own mercy
commissieven.kwaliteit: Strong but late. The promises are grounded in God's character rather than the preacher's direct 'I promise you'.

voorbeelden: every one who calls upon the name of the Lord will be saved
declaratieven.autoriteit: Moderate. The preacher relies on the authority of the quoted Scripture (Paul) to perform the declaration.

constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer becomes an observer of a theological argument rather than a participant in a divine encounter.

missende_elementen: Direct address of the promise to the specific congregation ('You are held')
performatief_deficit_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: Intellectual agreement without necessarily feeling the 'event' of being addressed by God.

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: High theological quality, but framed as a general truth rather than a direct address.
voorbeelden: We are held, not by our own efforts, but by God’s own mercy.

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Limited. Mostly 'if you will stay with me' or 'you will not think'.

derde_persoon.gebruik: Dominant. Talking about Paul, the Jews, the Nazis, and the Bible.

sacramenteel_patroon.beschrijving: Moves from Assertive (History/Exegesis) to a brief Commissive (The Promise).
voorbeelden: The Jews are the clue... The good news today is that we stand fast... by grace alone.
sacramenteel_patroon.kwaliteit: The transition is logical but lacks the 'I-Thou' immediacy of a sacramental event.

voorbeelden_goede_verhouding: We are held... That's the gospel.

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: The sermon functions primarily as a high-level lecture on biblical theology and history, only becoming a 'proclamation' in the final paragraphs.

sterke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: Paul puts some words in one column and others in a second column

zwakke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: Last summer I read a book... The name of it is The Righteous Gentiles...
zwakke_punten.probleem: Too much time spent 'talking about' books and history.

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: It becomes an event at the very end when the 'sola gratia' is announced, but the journey there is largely academic.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: The preacher remains a teacher/lecturer for 80% of the text.

openbaringsleer.god_als_spreker: God is the subject of the promises, but the preacher speaks as an analyst of the text.
openbaringsleer.prediker_als_mandataris: Implicitly through the 'Amen' and the office, but not explicitly performative.

pneumatologie.geest_rol_erkend: Yes, in the context of Paul's conscience.
tekstueel_bewijs: my conscience bears me witness in the Holy Spirit

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: The sermon aims to be a means of grace by the end.
sacramentstheologie.epifanisch_taalgebruik: The 'footprint on the beach' metaphor is epiphanic.

aanbevelingen.werkwoord_audit_samenvatting: Shift from 'Paul says' (Assertive) to 'God says to you' (Commissive/Declarative).

specifieke_suggesties.huidige_formulering: Paul is saying that the continuing unbelief... is part of God's plan.
specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: Hear this: even your failures and the world's rejection cannot thwart God's plan for you.
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Moves from third-person description to second-person address.

toezegging_versterking.probleem: The promise is buried under historical anecdotes.
toezegging_versterking.suggestie: Interweave the promise of 'irrevocable gifts' throughout the exegesis.
voorbeeldzinnen: God's call to you is irrevocable.

adressering_verbetering.suggestie: Use the 'Israelite connection' to address the hearer's own identity in Christ.
voorbeeldzinnen: You are the children of the living God.

indicatief_imperatief_herstel.probleem: The balance is actually good; the indicative is strong.
indicatief_imperatief_herstel.suggestie: Maintain the indicative but make it more performative.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A brilliant theological lecture that needs more 'fire' in its illocutionary delivery to become a truly sacramental event.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: SAT identifies that 'Some One is onto us' is a creative act of God, not just a 'Self-Revelation' of the preacher's feelings.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: The analysis focuses on what the words *do* (promise/bind) rather than just how they *persuade*.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT reveals that the sermon's 'event-character' is hindered by the high frequency of third-person historical assertives.

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: I am speaking the truth in Christ.
We are held, not by our own efforts, but by God’s own mercy.
kernzinnen_analyse.effectiviteit: Very High (the core of the event).

appendices.notities: The sermon is a masterclass in 'talking about' the gospel, which makes the final 'doing' of the gospel feel like a relief, but the ratio of information to encounter is skewed toward information.
